skins.shipDescription: Type III Akatsuki-class destroyer number two C Hibiki.
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Hibiki, from the 6th DesDiv~? I fought in many battles with my friends, and even saw the end of things. That's good and all, but... having to go in for repairs at that time was a bit awkward... Ahaha...
skins.acquisition: Nihihi~ We finally meet at last, Commander! The name's Hibiki! Don't you forget it!
skins.login: Commander, did you just pop in~? All righty... Let's both get some good work done today!
skins.details: Everyone in the 6th DesDiv is super unique! There's Ikazuchi, Inazuma, and we even have Akatsuki the ninja! I love everyone! Ehehe~
skins.secretaryIdle1: Verniy...? It has a nostalgic ring to it...
skins.secretaryIdle2: I'm so glad that we can all be together again~?
skins.secretaryIdle3: If you don't need me for anything, I'm going to go play with Ikazuchi and Inazuma~
skins.secretaryTouch: Yo! Did you call me, Commander?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Ah~! Commander, I bet you did that on purpose just now!

skins.shipDescription: New Year's finally comes to port! I, Hibiki of the 6th DesDiv, will be marking my new arrival in my New Year's attire! Commander, don't you dare change the channel - you've gotta watch my every move~!
skins.acquisition: New Year's finally comes to port! I, Hibiki of the 6th DesDiv, will be marking my new arrival in my New Year's attire! Commander, don't you dare change the channel - you've gotta watch my every move~!
skins.login: Commander, you haven't started working yet?
skins.details: Well, um, y'see, sorry to keep you all waiting for so long. I do feel kinda bad about it, but since we're all here, let's cheer up and put the past behind us! That's right, look forward! Ehehe~!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Akatsuki, you went all the way to the South Pole to look for me?! W-well, I certainly didn't expect that...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Just like me, Fubuki seems to also like being the center of attention. But for whatever reason, only she keeps getting herself into weird situations. Why is that?
skins.secretaryIdle3: This brisk weather is nothing compared to the cold of the Northern Parliament! Huh? I'm comparing it to the wrong thing?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: You couldn't control yourself because I looked too delicious? Commander, you beast~
skins.secretaryHeadpat: Want to know more about oni horn? Or this golden badge here?
